00020 #ifndef MOVE_H
00021 #define MOVE_H
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <cassert>
00025 
00026 #include <omnetpp.h>
00027 
00028 #include "Coord.h"
00029 #include "FWMath.h"
00030 
00039 class MIXIM_API Move : public cObject {
00040 protected:
00042     Coord startPos;
00044     Coord lastPos;
00046     simtime_t startTime;
00048     Coord direction;
00050     double speed;
00051 
00052 public:
00053     Move()
00054       : cObject()
00055       , startPos()
00056       , lastPos(0.0,0.0,DBL_MAX)
00057       , startTime()
00058       , direction()
00059       , speed(0.0)
00060     {}
00061     Move(const Move& mSrc)
00062       : cObject(mSrc)
00063     , startPos(mSrc.startPos)
00064       , lastPos(mSrc.lastPos)
00065       , startTime(mSrc.startTime)
00066       , direction(mSrc.direction)
00067       , speed(mSrc.speed)
00068     {}
00069 
00073     double getSpeed() const
00074   {
00075     return speed;
00076   }
00077 
00081   void setSpeed(double speed)
00082   {
00083     this->speed = speed;
00084   }
00085 
00089   const Coord& getStartPos() const
00090   {
00091     return startPos;
00092   }
00093 
00097   simtime_t_cref getStartTime() const
00098   {
00099     return startTime;
00100   }
00101 
00105   void setStart(const Coord& startPos, simtime_t_cref startTime)
00106   {
00107     this->lastPos   = startPos;
00108     this->startPos  = startPos;
00109     this->startTime = startTime;
00110   }
00111 
00116   void setStart(const Coord& startPos)
00117   {
00118     setStart(startPos, simTime());
00119   }
00120 
00124   const Coord& getDirection() const
00125   {
00126     return direction;
00127   }
00128 
00133   void setDirectionByVector(const Coord& direction)
00134   {
00135     assert( FWMath::close(direction.squareLength(), 1.0)
00136         || FWMath::close(direction.squareLength(), 0.0));
00137     this->direction = direction;
00138   }
00139 
00147   void setDirectionByTarget(const Coord& target)
00148   {
00149       direction = target - startPos;
00150 
00151       assert( !FWMath::close(direction.length(), 0.0) );
00152       direction /= direction.length();
00153     }
00154 
00165     virtual Coord getPositionAt(simtime_t_cref actualTime = simTime()) const
00166     {
00167       // if speed is very close to 0.0, the host is practically standing still
00168       if ( FWMath::close(speed, 0.0) ) return startPos;
00169 
00170       // otherwise: actualPos = startPos + ( direction * v * t )
00171       return startPos + ( direction * speed * SIMTIME_DBL(actualTime - startTime) );
00172     }
00173     virtual const Coord& getCurrentPosition() const
00174     {
00175       if (lastPos.z != DBL_MAX)
00176         return lastPos;
00177       return startPos;
00178     }
00179 
00180 public:
00181 
00185     std::string info() const {
00186         std::ostringstream ost;
00187         ost << " HostMove "
00188             << " startPos: " << startPos.info()
00189             << " direction: " << direction.info()
00190             << " startTime: " << startTime
00191             << " speed: " << speed;
00192         return ost.str();
00193     }
00194 };
00195 
00196 #endif
